str2: As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Now, just now, at this moment. Adverb from a derivative of airo through the idea of suspension; just now.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To be hungry, needy, desire earnestly. From the same as penes; to famish; figuratively, to crave.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To thirst for, desire earnestly. From a variation of dipsos; to thirst for.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To be poorly clad; To be habitually wearing an under-garment only. From a derivative of gumnos; to strip, i.e. go poorly clad.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To strike with the fist, buffet; hence: I mistreat violently. From a derivative of the base of kolazo; to rap with the fist.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To be unsettled, have no fixed abode, lead a vagabond life. To be non-stationary, i.e. homeless.
